title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Mine Site Onboarding Simulation Game-Based Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the five core safety protocols required for on-site mining operations.
Learners execute equipment operation and hazard response procedures in a simulated environment with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze the spatial structure and resource management systems of mining workplaces through 3D visualization tools.
